allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: replace static icons with custom SVG for Python, Markdown, and README

- Python: simplified official logo with gradients (blue #387EB8->#366994, yellow #FFE052->#FFC331)
- Markdown: custom purple (#912bac) design with down-arrow and "M" letter
- README: custom info icon with purple (#aa4fb2) rounded square and "i" symbol
- All icons embedded as inline SVG in src/index.ts
- Updated README Credits with note about hand-crafted Inkscape icons
- Version 1.0.42
EOF
)")
